p:
A research compendium (
47 ) containing all code and data to reproduce the analysis, as well the specification of the computing environment, is available as data file S3, in a publicly available GitHub repository ( https://github.com/bocinsky/guedesbocinsky2018), and archived with Zenodo at http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1239106. See the README.md file in data file S3 for details on reproducing the analysis. This code is written in Râ€”a free and open source software environment for statistical computing.
